Meet the Lamar ROMEOs
LAMAR, Mo. — The next time Juliet goes looking for Romeo, she may want to check the diners, especially if it’s breakfast time. A group of retired men, who go by the name “ROMEO”, …
www.fourstateshomepage.com

ROMEO chapters are found all over the United States: Retired old men eating out or retired old Motorcyclist eating out.

Sam
